definition: including only a part, public transport consisting of a fast train or bus that makes only a few scheduled stops
details:
adjective
- including only a part
- not unlimited
= example: not unlimited
- having a specific function or scope
= synonyms: special
- small in range or scope
= example: small in range or scope
- not excessive
- mediocre
= synonyms: modified
- subject to limits or subjected to limits
= synonyms: circumscribed
noun
- public transport consisting of a fast train or bus that makes only a few scheduled stops
= synonyms: express
